abstract: The same people who brought advanced data analysis to President Obama’s campaign is announcing a set of big data tools available through Amazon Web Services.
snippet: The same people who brought advanced data analysis to President Obama’s campaign is announcing a set of big data tools available through Amazon Web Services.
lead_paragraph: The kind of data science that worked for President Obama is coming to cloud computing, and working at a speed faster than the president ever saw.

headline.main: Bigger, Cheaper, Faster Data in the Cloud
